issue.title: Build SplitSync App
issue.body:
Build SplitSync expense sharing app with Next.js 16, TypeScript, Drizzle ORM, Socket.io, and Tailwind CSS.

Features:
1. User authentication
2. Group management
3. Expense tracking
4. Balance calculations
5. Settlements
6. Real-time updates

ems.task: Create project foundation with configuration files, CI/CD workflow, environment templates, and README. NO implementation code - only setup and infrastructure files.

workers.task: Create all project foundation files: .gitignore, package.json with dependencies (Next.js 16, TypeScript, Drizzle ORM, Socket.io, Tailwind CSS), tsconfig.json, GitHub Actions CI/CD workflow at .github/workflows/ci.yml, Dockerfile, .env.example, and README.md with project overview and setup instructions

analysisSummary: Build SplitSync expense sharing app with Next.js 16, TypeScript, Drizzle ORM, Socket.io, and Tailwind CSS. Implementation includes user authentication, group management, expense tracking with balance calculations, settlements, and real-time updates via WebSocket.

pendingEMs.task: Implement data layer with Drizzle ORM schema, database migrations, connection pooling, and repository pattern for all entities.
Build authentication system with NextAuth.js, session management, password hashing, and protected route middleware.
Create group management API endpoints for CRUD operations, member invitations, and permission handling.
Build expense tracking API with transaction recording, categorization, receipt uploads, and expense history.
Implement balance calculation engine with debt graph algorithms, simplified debt optimization, and settlement recommendations.
Build real-time notification system using Socket.io for live updates on expenses, settlements, and group activities.
Create reusable UI components including forms, cards, modals, navigation, and expense visualizations.
Build main application pages for dashboard, groups, expenses, settlements, and user settings with data fetching and state management.
Implement settlement workflow with payment tracking, partial payments, and settlement history with export functionality.
Add comprehensive testing with Jest/Playwright, E2E tests for critical flows, and load testing for WebSocket connections.
